name: Caramel Quest: Meitenkyō no Megami Zō
overview: Long time ago, during the celestial war between the light and the dark heavenly realms, a beautiful goddess statue was sent to promote peace between the realms. However, the dark side used the statue for the opposite purpose. In the end, powerful magic was needed to shatter the statue and finally starting the era of peace. However, the spirit of the goddess is about to be resurrected. Many years later, the young prince Toffeel is dreaming of a present for his birthday, but is sent by his strict father on a mission to exterminate monsters. Soon he becomes involved in the greatest adventure of his life...
